topic: AI Research and Publications

  entities:
    Videofact|Method
    Vita|Model
    Baichuan-omni|Report
    Emova|Model
    OpenOmni|Model
    VoiceBench|Benchmark
    SONAR|Framework
    GPT-4o|Model
    
  proposition: Videofact is a method for detecting video forgeries using attention, scene context, and forensic traces.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Videofact|FOCUSES_ON|video forgery detection
    Videofact|USES|attention
    Videofact|USES|scene context
    Videofact|USES|forensic traces

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Vita is an open-source interactive omni multimodal large language model.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Vita|TYPE|open-source
    Vita|TYPE|interactive
    Vita|TYPE|omni multimodal
    Vita|TYPE|large language model

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Baichuan-omni is a technical report on a multimodal AI system.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Baichuan-omni|TYPE|technical report
    Baichuan-omni|DESCRIBES|multimodal AI system

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Emova is a language model empowered to see, hear, and speak with vivid emotions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Emova|CAPABILITY|see
    Emova|CAPABILITY|hear
    Emova|CAPABILITY|speak
    Emova|FEATURE|vivid emotions

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: OpenOmni is a large language model for zero-shot omnimodal alignment with real-time emotional speech synthesis.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenOmni|TYPE|large language model
    OpenOmni|CAPABILITY|zero-shot omnimodal alignment
    OpenOmni|FEATURE|real-time emotional speech synthesis

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: VoiceBench is a benchmark for evaluating LLM-based voice assistants.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    VoiceBench|TYPE|benchmark
    VoiceBench|FOCUSES_ON|LLM-based voice assistants

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: SONAR is a synthetic AI-audio detection framework and benchmark.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SONAR|TYPE|framework
    SONAR|TYPE|benchmark
    SONAR|FOCUSES_ON|synthetic AI-audio detection

topic: AI Ethics and Security

  entities:
    Audio Deepfakes|Technological Concept
    Voice Assistants|Technology
    Cybercrime|Social Concept
    Biometric Authentication|Technology
    Disinformation|Social Concept
    
  proposition: Audio deepfakes have been surveyed as an emerging technological phenomenon.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio Deepfakes|STATUS|emerging technological phenomenon

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Researchers developed a method for detecting audio deepfakes through vocal tract reconstruction.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio Deepfakes|DETECTION_METHOD|vocal tract reconstruction

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: A study found that humans cannot reliably detect speech deepfakes.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Speech Deepfakes|DETECTION_DIFFICULTY|unreliable by humans

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Fraudsters have used AI to mimic a CEO's voice in a cybercrime case.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI|MISUSE|voice mimicry
    Cybercrime|METHOD|voice impersonation

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: AI poses a potential threat to biometric authentication.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI|POTENTIAL_THREAT|biometric authentication

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Deepfakes are creating new challenges in disinformation and geopolitics.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Deepfakes|IMPACT|disinformation challenges
    Deepfakes|IMPACT|geopolitical challenges

    entity-entity relationships:

topic: Research Methodologies

  entities:
    Web Survey|Research Method
    Virtual Reality|Technology
    Voice Assistants|Technology
    Large Language Models|Technological Concept
    
  proposition: Researchers conducted a web-based survey on speech and language practitioners' experiences with voice-assisted technology.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Web Survey|TYPE|web-based
    Web Survey|FOCUSES_ON|speech and language practitioners
    Web Survey|TOPIC|voice-assisted technology experiences

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Researchers explored fashion retail experiences using virtual reality and voice assistants.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Virtual Reality|APPLICATION|fashion retail experiences
    Voice Assistants|APPLICATION|fashion retail experiences

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: A survey explored hallucinations in large foundation models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Survey|TOPIC|hallucinations
    Large Language Models|CHARACTERISTIC|hallucinations

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Researchers developed a latent watermarking technique for audio generative models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Latent Watermarking|TYPE|technique
    Latent Watermarking|APPLICATION|audio generative models
